survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from attendees of hybrid events (both in-person and virtual) to understand their experiences, preferences, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: Which type of event attendance did you primarily choose for the hybrid event?
answer_options: A mix of both in-person and virtual attendance
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. This helps segment respondents for further questions.

script.question_text: Which type of event attendance did you primarily choose for the hybrid event?
answer_options: A mix of both in-person and virtual attendance

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall hybrid event experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for standardized responses. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall hybrid event experience?

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing your attendance method (in-person or virtual)?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture nuanced reasons. Limit response length to 200 characters for readability.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing your attendance method (in-person or virtual)?

questions.question_text: Which of the following hybrid event features did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice checkbox to allow multiple selections. Randomize answer order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following hybrid event features did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the virtual event platform's audio and video?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is 'Virtual attendance only' or 'A mix of both'
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale for consistency. Include a 'N/A' option if needed, but not here.

script.question_text: How would you rate the quality of the virtual event platform's audio and video?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is 'Virtual attendance only' or 'A mix of both'

questions.question_text: How would you rate the organization and logistics of the in-person event?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is 'In-person attendance only' or 'A mix of both'
questions.client_notes: Use same 5-point scale as Q5 for comparability. Ensure clear wording.

script.question_text: How would you rate the organization and logistics of the in-person event?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is 'In-person attendance only' or 'A mix of both'

questions.question_text: Did you experience any technical difficulties during the virtual sessions?
questions.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is 'Virtual attendance only' or 'A mix of both'
questions.client_notes: Binary yes/no question. Follow up with Q8 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Did you experience any technical difficulties during the virtual sessions?
script.routing_logic: Appears if Q1 answer is 'Virtual attendance only' or 'A mix of both'

questions.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical difficulties you encountered.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specific issues. Limit to 300 characters.

script.question_text: If yes, please describe the technical difficulties you encountered.

questions.question_text: How effective were the networking opportunities for your attendance type?
questions.client_notes: 5-point scale to measure perceived effectiveness. Include a 'Did not use' option if necessary.

script.question_text: How effective were the networking opportunities for your attendance type?

questions.question_text: Which of the following would improve your hybrid event experience in the future? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Better integration between in-person and virtual attendees
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice with limit of 3 selections. Randomize options to avoid order bias.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with max selections enforced

script.question_text: Which of the following would improve your hybrid event experience in the future? (Select up to 3)
answer_options: Better integration between in-person and virtual attendees

questions.question_text: Would you attend another hybrid event hosted by this organization?
questions.client_notes: 5-point intent scale to measure likelihood. Useful for predicting future attendance.

script.question_text: Would you attend another hybrid event hosted by this organization?

questions.question_text: What additional topics or sessions would you like to see in future hybrid events?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather new ideas. Limit to 250 characters.

script.question_text: What additional topics or sessions would you like to see in future hybrid events?
